originalText.text: This PRAISING review goes to Vanessa Spadotto and Sophia Kocevar while I was apt hunting at 140 Riverside Blvd luxury apartments.  The building and Equity Apartments are lucky to have this great team as they are such a rare asset and a great representation of professionalism I firmly recommend Vanessa and Sophia are the absolute best from being patient, listening to my apartment needs, helping me to imagine the space design and finding the best price - all while focusing on finding me the best unit to call home. They have always been available to answer my questions from phone to email and the entire process has been so smooth and transparent. I highly recommend reaching out to them for your apartment hunting needs in this building.

originalText.text:
After over a year of unnecessary cosmetic construction in the lobby of 303 e 83rd Street, NY NY, which resulted in zero security for the building and tenants have to go in the service entrance by the dumpsters for the duration, instead of responding to tenant complaints the building raised everyone's rent hundreds of dollars and told them to hit the road if they didn't like it.

RIGHT NOW FLOOR 21 IS INVESTED WITH COCKROACHES. NEW TENANTS ONLY LASTED TWO WEEKS BEFORE FLEEING.

These people treat their tenants like animals in a rural zoo. So many apartments are up for rent because the tenants are miserable and moving out in droves.

BTW they are about to do another poorly managed construction job on their elevators and the hallways. Be prepared to live in a refugee camp in 2019.

originalText.text: Excellent management! It was easy to work with them. Professional staff and great apartments.
